branchCategory.name: AZ
branchCategory.description: <p>Series AZ is an ultra high purity (UHP) diaphragm valve for gas delivery in semiconductor and other clean industries.  This series is available in manually operated.</p>

branchItem.name: AZ3652 & AZ4652, Diaphragm Valve, Manually Operated
